command.text:
declare @numRow int, @viewAccessMode int, @switch char(1), @switch$Period char(1), @switch$Date smalldatetime &UserViewAccessMode; &BeginExecuteReader;&CarryOff;
if exists(select 1 from dmdntt where client_code = @@unit and status = '1') begin declare @s$Period char(1) if exists(select 1 from dmdntt where client_code = @@unit and tieu_chuan = '2' and status = '1') select @s$Period = '1' select status as switch, isnull(ngay_hl, '') as switch_date, isnull(@s$Period, '0') as switch_period from dmdntt where client_code = @@unit end else select '1' as switch, null as switch_date, '0' as switch_period &EndExecuteReader; select @numRow = 10, @viewAccessMode = value from #Table select @switch = switch, @switch$Period = switch_period, @switch$Date = switch_date from #Table1 select @numRow as value, 'setReference(''$swicth'', ''' + @switch + ''');setReference(''$switch$Period'', ''' + @switch$Period +''');setReference(''$switch$Date'', ''' + case when @switch$Date is not null then convert(varchar(8), @switch$Date, 112) else '' end + ''')' as script exec FastBusiness$App$Voucher$Loading @@id, '@@master', '@@prime', '@@partition', '@@expression', '@@extension', @numRow, 'stt_rec', @@textList, @@textExternal, &Join;, @@textOrderBy, @@admin, @@userID, @viewAccessMode, 0, '', 'client_code = '@@unit'', default, default, default, 1

if @@commandArgument in ('40' ,'45', '51') begin declare @context varchar(32) select @context = case when @@commandArgument = '40' then 'Other' when @@commandArgument = '45' then 'Period' else 'OtherReplacement' end select 'executeCommand(''New'', ''' + @context + ''')' as script return end
